doc:
Mark Griffin (actor) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mark_Griffin_(actor) 0 Mark David Charles Griffin (born 25 February 1968 in Basingstoke, Hampshire) is an English actor best known for his role as "Trojan" on the television series Gladiators. Mark_David_Charles_Griffin ( born 25_February_1968 in Basingstoke , Hampshire ) is an_English_actor best_known for his_role as " Trojan " on the_television_series_Gladiators .
